title: DeusEx Invisible War XBOX NTSC
description:
Published by:                      Eidos Interactive
Developed by:                    Ion Storm
Region:                               NTSC
Genre:                                 First-Person Action Adventure
Number of Players:             1
Release Date:                     December 2, 2003
ESRB Content Descriptors: Blood and Gore

Following the events of the original Deus Ex the world has entered a period of recovery. In this weakened state, dangerous military groups from around the world have begun plotting global domination and it&#039;s your job to fight to ensure that the world can rebuild safely. Experience an unprecedented level of freedom in Invisible War as players can decide their own unique strategy; choose to fight with guns, negotiate, hack computers or rely on stealth. Obtain a slew of useful tools and biomods, which allow you to run faster, leap 40 ft in the air, see through walls and much more. Breathtaking graphics set a new standard for realism in a First-Person-Shooter
